Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Gashouse in 1987...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1987, off Jeffrey Poon (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/28/1987, off Warren Venne (HAL)...
Injured on 7/29/1987 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Gashouse to New Jersey on 3/1/1990 (Going to GHG: P A. Diez, P G. Ubeda, P J. Young. Going to NJ: CF M. McPhee)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Gashouse on 6/20/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1990, hitting .438 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1990, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Plum Grove on 7/31/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1991, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Bay City on 8/23/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1992, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1992, hitting .442 with 2 HR, 18 RBI...
